xwikidoc.content: ### Globally administrate the registration of new users in a wiki. #set($legend = ['registration']) #set($params = $util.hashMap) #set($params.registration = ['use_email_verification', 'auth_active_check', 'validation_email_content', 'confirmation_email_content', 'invitation_email_content']) #includeForm('XWiki.AdminFieldsDisplaySheet')
